verses.t: What{G5101} shall we say{G2046} then{G3767}? Shall we continue{G1961} in sin{G3588}, that{G2443} grace{G3588} may abound{G4121}?
God forbid{G1096}. How{G4459} shall we{G2198}, that{G3748} are dead{G599} to sin{G3588}, live{G2198} any longer{G2089} therein{G846}?
Know ye not{G50}, that{G3754} so many of us as{G3745} were baptized{G907} into{G1519} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547} were baptized{G907} into{G1519} his{G846} death{G3588}?

Therefore{G3767} we are buried with{G4916} him{G846} by{G1223} baptism{G3588} into{G1519} death{G3588}: that{G2443} like as{G5618} Christ{G5547} was raised up{G1453} from{G1537} the dead{G3498} by{G1223} the glory{G3588} of the Father{G3588}, even so{G3779} we{G2249}also{G2532} should walk{G4043} in{G1722} newness{G2538} of life{G2222}.
For{G1063} if{G1487} we have been{G1096} planted together{G4854} in the likeness{G3588} of his{G846} death{G3588}, we shall be{G2071} also{G2532} in the likeness of his resurrection{G3588}:

Knowing{G1097} this{G5124}, that{G3754} our{G2257} old{G3820} man{G444} is crucified with{G4957} him, that{G2443} the body{G3588} of sin{G3588} might be destroyed{G2673}, that{G3588} henceforth{G3371} we{G2248} should{G1398} not{G3371} serve{G1398} sin{G3588}.
For{G1063} he that is dead{G599} is freed{G1344} from{G575} sin{G3588}.
Now{G1161} if{G1487} we be dead{G599} with{G4862} Christ{G5547}, we believe{G4100} that{G3754} we shall{G4800} also{G2532} live with{G4800} him{G846}:
Knowing{G1492} that{G3754} Christ{G5547} being raised{G1453} from{G1537} the dead{G3498} dieth{G599} no more{G3765}; death{G2288} hath{G2961} no more{G3765} dominion{G2961} over him{G846}.
For{G1063} in that{G3739} he died{G599}, he died{G599} unto sin{G3588} once{G2178}: but{G1161} in that{G3739} he liveth{G2198}, he liveth{G2198} unto God{G3588}.

Likewise{G3779} reckon{G3049} ye{G5210} also{G2532} yourselves{G1438} to be{G1511} dead{G3498} indeed{G3303} unto sin{G3588}, but{G1161} alive{G2198} unto God{G3588} through{G1722} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547} our{G2257} Lord{G3588}.
Let{G936} not{G3361} sin{G3588} therefore{G3767} reign{G936} in{G1722} your{G5216} mortal{G2349} body{G4983}, that ye should{G1519} obey{G5219} it{G846} in{G1722} the lusts{G3588} thereof{G846}.

Neither{G3366} yield ye{G3936} your{G5216} members{G3588} as instruments{G3696} of unrighteousness{G93} unto sin{G3588}: but{G235} yield{G3936} yourselves{G1438} unto God{G3588}, as{G5613} those that are alive{G2198} from{G1537} the dead{G3498}, and{G2532} your{G5216} members{G3588} as instruments{G3696} of righteousness{G1343} unto God{G3588}.
For{G1063} sin{G266} shall{G2961} not{G3756} have dominion over{G2961} you{G5216}: for{G1063} ye are{G2075} not{G3756} under{G5259} the law{G3551}, but{G235} under{G5259} grace{G5485}.
What{G5101} then{G3767}? shall we sin{G264}, because{G3754} we are{G2070} not{G3756} under{G5259} the law{G3551}, but{G235} under{G5259} grace{G5485}? God forbid{G1096}.

Know ye{G1492} not{G3756}, that{G3754} to whom{G3739} ye yield{G3936} yourselves{G1438} servants{G1401} to{G1519} obey{G5218}, his servants{G1401} ye are{G2075} to whom{G3739} ye obey{G5219}; whether{G2273} of sin{G266} unto{G1519} death{G2288}, or{G2228} of obedience{G5218} unto{G1519} righteousness{G1343}?

But{G1161} God{G3588} be thanked{G5485}, that{G3754} ye were{G2258} the servants{G1401} of sin{G3588}, but{G1161} ye have obeyed{G5219} from{G1537} the heart{G2588} that form{G5179} of doctrine{G1322} which{G3739} was delivered you{G3860}.
Being{G1659} then{G1161} made free{G1659} from{G575} sin{G3588}, ye became the servants{G1402}of righteousness{G3588}.

I speak{G3004} after the manner of men{G442} because of{G1223} the infirmity{G3588} of your{G5216} flesh{G3588}: for{G1063} as{G5618} ye have yielded{G3936} your{G5216} members{G3588} servants{G1401} to uncleanness{G3588} and{G2532} to iniquity{G3588} unto{G1519} iniquity{G3588}; even so{G3779} now{G3568} yield{G3936} your{G5216} members{G3588} servants{G1401} to righteousness{G3588} unto{G1519} holiness{G38}.
For{G1063} when{G3753} ye were{G2258} the servants{G1401} of sin{G3588}, ye were{G2258} free{G1658} from righteousness{G3588}.
What{G5101} fruit{G2590} had ye{G2192} then{G5119} in{G1909} those things whereof{G3739} ye are{G1870} now{G3568} ashamed{G1870}? for{G1063} the end{G5056} of those things{G1565} is death{G2288}.

But{G1161} now{G3570} being made free{G1659} from{G575} sin{G3588}, and{G1161} become servants{G1402} to God{G3588}, ye have{G2192} your{G5216} fruit{G3588} unto{G1519} holiness{G38}, and{G1161} the end{G5056} everlasting{G166} life{G2222}.
For{G1063} the wages{G3800} of sin{G3588} is death{G2288}; but{G1161} the gift{G5486} of God{G3588} is eternal{G166} life{G2222} through{G1722} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547} our{G2257} Lord{G3588}.
